solution_line_template: He has to read {total_pages_goal_week} pages a week because {days_in_week} x {daily_average_goal} = <<{days_in_week}*{daily_average_goal}={total_pages_goal_week}>>{total_pages_goal_week}

He has to read {pages_for_saturday} pages on Saturday because {total_pages_goal_week}-{total_pages_read_so_far} =<<{total_pages_goal_week}-{total_pages_read_so_far}={pages_for_saturday}>>{pages_for_saturday}
